DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether remote ischemic preconditioning with postconditioning (RIPC+RIPostC) reduces myocardial injury and improves clinical outcomes in heart transplantation surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Remote Ischemic Preconditioning With Postconditioning in Heart Transplantation Surgery
DOC.criteria: scheduled for elective orthotopic heart transplantation surgery peripheral vascular disease affecting the upper arms mechanical circulatory support before surgery taking the antidiabetic sulphonylurea, glibenclamide cold ischemic time of donor heart > 12 hours repeated heart surgery
